subject: Re: New file uploaded to EVP-ITC
author: Steve Hultay
full_text:
Gab,

I listened to the file and didn't catch anything right away, so i 
downloaded your file and put it into cool edit and slowed it up and 
reversed it too.  I really don't think that file says anything, you 
may have overprocessed that file too much to begin with.  If you send 
me a raw recording clip of a question and answer, i will be more than 
happy to go over it for you and than i will explain how i edited your 
file so you can do the same in the future.  Box files don't need that 
much editing, i usually just ask a question and than cut out some of 
the in between static leaving just the answer.  And you really don't 
need to edit the answers that much because it's radio and clear 
already.  Sometimes i just slow it down maybe 10% and that's it, and 
if it's an answer in a distance i will raise the volume on just that 
section of the audio.  If you need any help, i'm here.

-Steve H.




--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com wrote:
